description:
Design management is a multifaceted field that brings together design thinking and business thinking to create and continuously improve products, services, and experiences. So how do design management professionals effectively facilitate and manage the design process and help meet the goals of an organization? Moreover, what skills and dispositions does one need to be a successful Art Director, Design Strategist, Design Director, or general Art Manager? If these questions are intriguing to you and you would like to learn more about design management, then this course is for you!

Through media and multimedia presentations, you will become familiar with the field of design management and some of the roles and responsibilities of design management professionals. Throughout this course, you will consider how you can incorporate new design management ideas into your own professional, or future professional, career. This course provides an overview of design management topics including design methodologies, innovation, managing the design process, and designing a business model.
title: Exploring Design Management
